title: Sustainable HR Practices - Performance, Compensation, Benefits & Recognition
overview: This section focuses on recognizing and supporting positive behaviors and impactful involvement by aligning compensation and benefits policies with sustainability goals.

solutions.title: Define a Sustainable Compensation Policy
solutions.description: Design sustainable compensation that promotes sustainable behaviors through balanced base/variable pay structures, ensuring compensation drives appropriate long-term development rather than short-term gains.
key_recommendations: Develop compensation philosophy ensuring pay equity, particularly for employees with interrupted careers or underrepresented groups
Focus on skills required rather than experience years or educational credentials
Conduct gender-based compensation audits to identify and correct pay gaps
Publish salary ranges internally as a transparency commitment
Automate payment processes for efficiency and accuracy

solutions.title: Include Sustainable Goals in Your Performance Management
solutions.description: Establish clear performance assessment criteria ensuring alignment and focus on deliverables through sustainable goal-setting.
implementation_steps: Apply SMART framework: goals should be Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant and Time-based
Implement standardized company-wide system ensuring equal treatment
Add sustainable metrics including volunteering hours, green initiative participation, diversity hiring/promotion

solutions.title: Adopt a Sustainable Approach for Benefits
solutions.description: Integrate sustainability into employee benefits programs, encouraging responsible choices and social impact.
recommended_actions: Support volunteering hours and matching gifts programs
Provide long-term financial planning advice with sustainable/green fund options
Allow unused PTO conversion to charitable grants
Source sustainable providers for employee gifts and celebrations
Implement flexible work policies emphasizing outcomes over presence
Provide one paid day annually for volunteering activities

solutions.title: Recognize Sustainable Initiatives and Enable Sustainable Recognition
solutions.description: Establish recognition programs that celebrate sustainable actions and contributions to company sustainability goals.
best_practices: Create prizes for individuals or teams achieving sustainability objectives
Design sustainable rewards replacing physical objects with experiences (vouchers, meals)
Encourage team recognition alongside individual awards
Make sustainability contributors visible within organization
Link recognition to sustainability milestones and achievements
